project.title: [Client Redacted] - DevOps & AWS Development

challenge.summary: Create scalable, secure Internal Developer Platform applications on AWS Cloud that meet analytical needs of multiple departmental projects while maintaining high security and compliance standards.

solution.summary: Strategic DevOps practices and AWS technologies:
deliverables: Needs analysis and architectural design with PoC implementation
Infrastructure as Code using AWS CDK, SDK, and CLI
CI/CD pipelines (AWS CodeCommit, CodePipeline, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy)
Security and governance implementation on code and IaC
Advanced deployment practices with SonarQube and JFROG Artifactory

outcomes: ✅ Robust automation and continuous enhancement of deployment processes
✅ High security and compliance standards maintained
✅ Automated pipeline processes improving development efficiency
